member.name: DashCap
member.summary: The DashCap enumeration specifies the type of graphic shape to use on both ends of each dash in a dashed line.

member.name: DashCap.DashCapFlat
member.summary: Specifies a square cap that squares off both ends of each dash.

member.name: DashCap.DashCapRound
member.summary: Specifies a circular cap that rounds off both ends of each dash.

member.name: DashCap.DashCapTriangle
member.summary: Specifies a triangular cap that points both ends of each dash.
